name: mattermost-e2e-tests

scripts.test: cucumber-js --require-module ts-node/register --require steps/**/*.ts --format json:reports/report.json --format progress-bar features/**/*.feature --world-parameters "{\"defaultTimeout\":35000}"

description: This folder contains the adapted tests that call the mattermost backend API directly (faster and reliable). The suite uses Cucumber (`@cucumber/cucumber`) with TypeScript and `superagent` for HTTP.
